body.name: RG35XX Plus Retro Handheld Game Console 3.5 Inch IPS Screen Linux System Video Player Built-in 64G TF Card 5000 Games Support HD-M-I TV Output 5G WiFi Bluetooth 4.2
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 45 mins
features: 【5000 More Classic Games】RG35XX Plus Built in 64G TF card support more than 5000 classic games, Support more than 10 emulator, support MD, PCE and other games in various formats.dual card slots, support TF card expansion, maximum 512GB, support users to download games in relevant formats.

[Linux System & Cortex-A53 Chip] RG35XX Plus uses Linux System, H700 quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 CPU, 1.5GHz frequency, dual-core G31 MP2 GPU, LPDDR4 1GB RAM, 16GB TF/MicroSD Storage, Ensure higher stability and running speed, make your game screen smoother.

[HD screen and high capacity battery] 3.5-inch IPS full viewing angle, OCA full lamination screen, 640x480 resolution, narrow frame design. equipped with 3300mAh battery efficient lithium battery, for ultra-long standby time and battery life. Support up to 8 hours game playing, can use 5V/1.5A charger Charging, support C2C charger.

[More Features] RG35XX Plus supports 2.4/5G WIFI, Bluetooth 4.2, 2.4G wireless and wired controller,.Bluetooth Handle Connection,H-D-M-I output TV, can connect console to the TV so that you can enjoy the funny and lively video game in bigger screen, also vibration motor, WIFI online pairing, streaming etc, and with the functions of saving. loading games, favorites and recent folders.

[Portable and Trendy] Compact and light weight video game handheld with simple and never outdated design, suitable for carry it to anywhere at anytime. The perfect choice for enjoying childhood fun in airplanes, camps, travel or on the way to work. You can put it in your pocket or bag, and carry it with you on the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing yourselves.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RG35XX Plus Handheld Games Console RG35XX Plus is an upgraded version of RG35XX. upgraded with functions, allowing you to run games faster. RG35XX Plus comes in 3 colors, namely Transparent black, Gray, and White. It has an exquisite appearance, is compact and convenient, and is a great gift! ! !

3.5-inch IPS HD Screen 3.5-inch IPS full viewing angle, OCA full lamination screen, 640x480 resolution, narrow frame design, In the game, the picture is clear and visually more comfortable. Upgrade Chip RG35XX Plus uses Linux System, H700 quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 CPU, 1.5GHz frequency, dual-core G31 MP2 GPU, LPDDR4 1GB RAM, 16GB TF/MicroSD Storage, Ensure higher stability and running speed, make your game screen smoother. Over 5000 Retro Games RG35XX Plus Built in 64G TF card support more than 5000 classic games. Support more than 10 emulator, support MD, SMS, PCE and other games in various formats.dual card slots, support TF card expansion, maximum 512GB, support users to download games in relevant formats.

Supports H-D-M-I Output TV The game console supports H-D-M-I output and can be used on TV, personal computers, etc. The small screen becomes a large screen, with the visual advantage of high definition. Note: You cannot directly plug in the H-D-M-I cable. You need to start the device first, check the signal, and then plug in the H-D-M-I for use. Supports Moonlight Streaming RG35XX Plus Supports Moonlight Streaming, Play PC Game Freely，High quality visuals，you can play games with your friends during your break !!! 5G WIFI&Bluetooth 4.2 RG35XX Plus supports 2.4/5G WIFI, Bluetooth 4.2, supports 2.4G wireless and wired controller,Bluetooth Handle Connection, WIFI online pairing etc, and with the functions of saving.

High Capacity Battery RG35XX Plus Game Console equipped with 3300mAh battery efficient lithium battery, for ultra-long standby time and battery life. Support up to 8 hours game playing, can use 5V/1.5A charger Charging, support C2C charger. Vibration Motor Immersive Gaming Experience,you can feel vibrations while playing the game, and the gaming experience is very good. Portable Handheld Console Compact and light weight video game handheld with simple and never outdated design, suitable for carry it to anywhere at anytime. The perfect choice for enjoying childhood fun in airplanes, camps, travel or on the way to work. You can put it in your pocket or bag, and carry it with you on the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing yourselves.

Some FAQ Tips： Q: SD Card Cannot Recognize Games. A: Can convert SD card game format and check if the game is correctly placed in the emulator folder. Q: The speaker has no sound. A: Can try soldering the headphone holder. Q: Why it shows nothing charging when plug in charger? A: Please prepare 5V/1.5A or below adapter charger charge this console. Fast charge 5V/2A or above maynot working with this console. Q: The game console cannot be turned on. A: Can first unplug the battery, reinsert it, and then refresh the system to solve the problem. Q: After the game console is turned on, the interface remains on the logo. A:Can first unplug the battery, reinsert it, and then refresh the system to solve the problem.

Product Description Color：Transparent black/Gray/ White Screen：3.5-inch IPS full viewing angle, OCA full lamination/ 640*480 CPU：H700 quad-core ARM Cortex-A53, 1.5GHz frequency GPU：dual- core G31 MP2 RAM：LPDDR4 1GB Storage：64GB TF/MicroSD System：Linux WIFI/Bluetooth：2.4/5G WIFI 802.11a/b/g/n/ac,Bluetooth 4.2 Battery：Li-polymer battery 3300mAh, lasting 8 hours Charging：5V/1.5A, support C2C charger
Packaging list: RG35XX Plus Gaming Console * 1 USB Charging Cable*1 Screen Protector*1 User Manual*1 Giftbox*1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic games, precious childhood memories!
reviews.reviewText: If you are 1980's boy, like me. You will love it and should not miss it: is different than any other single platform ones.1. This open source handheld game console is an all-in-one monster that supports thousands of classic games from all other platforms.2. Its battery is strong enough to play the whole day.3. It runs smoothly on most games including PSP ones. Thanks to its upgraded CPU.4. I like the button touch, esp the slope design of R1/L1 buttons in the back helps you to press them more comfortably. The size and weight are also kids friendly, my kids love it.5. You can definitely play it as a game console on table at home as well. It supports 2.4/5G WIFI, bluetooth, wireless/wired controller connection, HDMI output to TV, vibration motor, WIFI online pairing, streaming etc. Streaming has a little latency, but it is quite normal to such a small device.6. It comes with an internal 64GB micro SD card, you can also add an additional one for extra storage for you downloaded games.7. The screw hole design on the battery lid in the back tributes to the classic. Love it!8. Classic games and the size of this little monster are always a perfect match. You just grab and go. Take it from your pocket and enjoy playing anytime.Anyway I love it so much! It brings me back to my childhood memories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fun to use but had to returned. My hands hurt after a few minutes because is to small and you have to put your fingers in a weird position to play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Revision to the original
reviews.reviewText: This lil guy is amazing! Great upgrade from the OG RG35xx. Just a bump in performance to hold up better with emulation. To my surprise it can actually play “some” N64, Dreamcast and NDS games. You can also add more games and customize it to your liking with other OS like Onion, Garlic, Batocera or Koriki or others. Not sure why no one has reviewed this even though they sold many already so here’s my 2 cents. Shipping was overnight with prime and was on time. I actually bought a few more for gifts since shipping is so quick.

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad Fame console not working
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Battery died plug it in to charge and it hasn’t been turning on, I try to reset, everything there is to do and still nothing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Shady product from a shady company.
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited for my RG35XX Plus, and it booted up the first time I turned it on. Ever since then, however, it boots to a blank screen. Customer service asked me to update the firmware on the device by sending me a link to some guy's Google Drive, which is SUPER sketchy. They are now refusing to give me a refund.
